Class MessageOfTheDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.MessageOfTheDay

  • public class MessageOfTheDay
extends java.lang.Object
    Message Of The Day fetches and decodes a string from the CS-230 webpage.
    Author:
    Jeffrey
